result:
Now I have all the information needed to produce my editorial review. Here is my structured JSON output:

```json
{
  "entry_date": "1882-05-01",
  "verdict": "acceptable",
  "issues": [
    {
      "paragraph": "15.07",
      "severity": "medium",
      "category": "word_choice",
      "issue": "\"Jedeme\" (we're going by vehicle) vs \"Nous allons\" (we're going) - slight over-specification. French is neutral about transport method.",
      "suggestion": "\"Jdeme\" would be more neutral, though \"Jedeme\" works given they later take a carriage."
    },
    {
      "paragraph": "15.07",
      "severity": "low",
      "category": "register",
      "issue": "\"okouzlující\" is slightly stronger than \"charmante\". Marie's self-assessment is confident but measured.",
      "suggestion": "\"roztomilá\" or \"půvabná\" might be closer to the period register, though \"okouzlující\" conveys her self-confidence well."
    },
    {
      "paragraph": "15.07",
      "severity": "low",
      "category": "stylistic_choice",
      "issue": "\"s lehkým nádechem rebelky\" is a good rendering of \"faux air de frondeuse\", successfully capturing the elegant defiance without being too literal.",
      "suggestion": null
    },
    {
      "paragraph": "15.08",
      "severity": "medium",
      "category": "punctuation",
      "issue": "\"Ke královně v naději, že potkám Cassagnaca\" - the marginal note format is correct, but Czech typically uses \"že se setkám\" or \"že tam bude\" for this type of hopeful expectation.",
      "suggestion": "\"Ke královně v naději, že tam potkám Cassagnaca\" or \"Ke královně v naději na setkání s Cassagnacem\""
    },
    {
      "paragraph": "15.09",
      "severity": "low",
      "category": "naturalness",
      "issue": "\"Povídáme si s Bastienem a pak s Carolus-Duranem\" - natural and good. The flow works well in Czech.",
      "suggestion": null
    },
    {
      "paragraph": "15.09",
      "severity": "low",
      "category": "terminology",
      "issue": "\"ke kočáru\" is correct and period-appropriate. Good choice over more modern alternatives.",
      "suggestion": null
    }
  ],
  "comments": [
    {
      "paragraph": "15.07",
      "severity": "MEDIUM",
      "text": "\"Jedeme\" slightly over-specifies transport mode where French \"allons\" is neutral. Consider \"Jdeme\" but acceptable as-is given carriage context."
    },
    {
      "paragraph": "15.08",
      "severity": "MEDIUM",
      "text": "\"v naději, že potkám\" - slightly awkward; \"v naději, že tam potkám\" or \"v naději na setkání s\" would be more natural Czech"
    }
  ],
```
